entities.name: muggle money
entities.description: Muggle money is mentioned as something that can be compared to the wizarding currency.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is Mrs. Weasley's name, and she is excitedly looking at Mr. Granger's ten-pound notes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron says to Hermione that he will meet her back here.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one Ron says he will meet back here.

entities.name: mr granger
entities.description: Mr. Granger has ten-pound notes in his hand.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are led off to their underground vaults by another Gringotts goblin.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who enjoys the breakneck journey down to the Weasleys' vault.

entities.name: knockturn alley
entities.description: Knockturn Alley is mentioned as a place where Harry felt dreadful before.

entities.name: sickles
entities.description: There are silver Sickles inside the Weasleys' vault.

entities.name: galleon
entities.description: There is just one gold Galleon inside the Weasleys' vault.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy mutters vaguely about needing a new quill.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George have something to do.

relationships.description: Ron says he will meet Hermione back here.
Harry enjoys the breakneck journey down to the Weasleys' vault.
Mrs. Weasley sweeps the whole lot of silver Sickles into her bag.
There is just one gold Galleon inside Harry's vault.
Percy mutters vaguely about needing a new quill.
Fred and George have something to do.
